author: Emma Jurado
text:
The inaugural Dew Downtown Flagstaff is a high-octane, two-day urban snowboarding and skiing festival through the streets of historic downtown Flagstaff. Watch winter sports daredevils of all ages grind, jump and shred over park benches, trash cans, guard rails and other urban obstacles. We’re already stockpiling the snow, getting ready to turn San Francisco Street into the ultimate winter playground. Celebrate Flagstaff, Winterfest style, at this high flying event! 
When: Saturday, February 11, 2012 and Sunday February 12, 2012
Where: Flagstaff, AZ at San Francisco St. between Dale Ave and Birch Ave
Parking: Free parking available throughout the downtown area. Look for parking ambassadors for directions.
For more information please visit http://www.dewdowntownflagstaff.com/
title: City of Flagstaff,AZ Hosts Urban Ski and Snowboard Festival
